name: High Moon
description:
The heavens hide conflict, and the stars decide our fates. Go head-to-head with a friend in this final showdown!

High Moon is a two-player, one-controller game. Each player takes control of either the left or right side of the controller and the corresponding desperado on screen. Xbox or Xbox One controllers are compatible.

High Moon was produced for the 2016 Mystic Western Game Jam.
